name: arxiv_search
description: Search arXiv papers. Returns titles, authors, abstract snippets, arxiv IDs, and categories.

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('li.arxiv-result').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const titleEl = el.querySelector('p.title'); const authorsEl = el.querySelector('p.authors'); const abstractEl = el.querySelector('.abstract-full') || el.querySelector('.abstract-short'); const idEl = el.querySelector('.list-title a[href*="/abs/"]'); const catsEl = el.querySelector('.tags'); results.push({ title: titleEl?.textContent?.replace('Title:', '')?.trim() || '', authors: authorsEl?.textContent?.replace('Authors:', '')?.trim() || '', abstract: (abstractEl?.textContent?.trim()?.replace(/\s*(More|Less)\s*$/, '') || '').slice(0, 300), arxiv_id: idEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: idEl?.href || '', categories: catsEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results };
steps.name: results
steps.label: Extract papers
